meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

main.docTitle: Public Health and Municipal Services (Fees and Charges) (Leisure Facilities) Regulation

section.name: s2
section.heading: Interpretation
section.def: accompanying carer (同行照料者), in relation to a disabled person, means a person who accompanies the disabled person in the capacity of a carer for the purpose of providing care to the disabled person in a public swimming pool or public pleasure ground. (L.N. 81 of 2013)

subsection.content: The fees payable by an individual as a member of the public for admission to public swimming pools are as provided for in Schedule 1.

subsection.leadIn: The fees payable by an individual as a member of the public for the hire of the following facilities in public pleasure grounds are as provided for in Schedule 2—

subsection.content: The amounts payable by an individual as a member of the public as the camp fees for holiday camps in public pleasure grounds are as provided for in Schedule 3.

schedule.name: sch1
schedule.heading: Fees for Admission to Public Swimming Pools

section.name: s1
section.heading: Fee for monthly ticket
section.content: The fee payable for a ticket specified in column 2 of the table below is the amount specified in column 3 of the table opposite the ticket.

td.leadIn: A ticket for 1 month for an unlimited number of entries to all public swimming pools (except Wan Chai Swimming Pool) for—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: a person aged 3 or above, but below 14;

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.content: an accompanying carer of a disabled person; or

td.p: A ticket for 1 month for an unlimited number of entries to all public swimming pools (except Wan Chai Swimming Pool) for a person other than those mentioned in item 1

subsection.content: The fee payable for a single entry into a public swimming pool by a person who falls within a description specified in column 2 of the table below and enters into the swimming pool at any time during a session commencing on a day specified in the heading of column 3 of the table is the amount specified in that column 3 opposite the description.

The fee payable for a single entry into a public swimming pool by a person who falls within a description specified in column 2 of the table below and enters into the swimming pool at any time during a session commencing on a day specified in the heading of column 4 of the table is the amount specified in that column 4 opposite the description.

subsection.def: session (節) means a session specified by the Director of Leisure and Cultural Services under section 9(c) of the Public Swimming Pools Regulation (Cap. 132 sub. leg. BR).

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.content: an accompanying carer of a disabled person; or

td.p: A person other than those mentioned in items 1 and 2

part.name: P1
part.heading: Tennis Courts, Basketball Courts, Squash Courts, Table Tennis Tables and Badminton Courts

section.name: s1
section.heading: Fee for hire of tennis court, basketball court, squash court, table tennis table or badminton court

subsection.content: The fee payable for hiring a facility specified in column 2 of the table below by a person who falls within a description specified in column 3 of the table opposite the facility for a period commencing at a time that falls within the period specified in the heading of column 4 of the table is the amount specified in that column 4 opposite the description.

The fee payable for hiring a facility specified in column 2 of the table below by a person who falls within a description specified in column 3 of the table opposite the facility for a period commencing at a time that falls within the period specified in the heading of column 5 of the table is the amount specified in that column 5 opposite the description.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Fee for hire of football pitch

subsection.content: The fee payable for hiring a facility specified in column 2 of the table below by a person who falls within a description specified in column 3 of the table opposite the facility during a period commencing at a time that falls within the period specified in the heading of column 4 of the table is the amount specified in that column 4 opposite the description.

The fee payable for hiring a facility specified in column 2 of the table below by a person who falls within a description specified in column 3 of the table opposite the facility during a period commencing at a time that falls within the period specified in the heading of column 5 of the table is the amount specified in that column 5 opposite the description.

section.name: s1
section.heading: Camp fee for day camp and evening camp

subsection.content: The amount payable as the camp fee for a facility specified in column 2 of the table below by a person who falls within a description specified in column 3 of the table opposite the facility for a day specified in the heading of column 4 of the table is the amount specified in that column 4 opposite the description.

The amount payable as the camp fee for a facility specified in column 2 of the table below by a person who falls within a description specified in column 3 of the table opposite the facility for a day specified in the heading of column 5 of the table is the amount specified in that column 5 opposite the description.

subparagraph.content: an accompanying carer of a disabled person

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.content: A person other than those mentioned in paragraphs (a), (b) and (c)

subparagraph.content: an accompanying carer of a disabled person

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.content: A person other than those mentioned in paragraphs (a), (b) and (c)

subsection.content: The amount payable as the camp fee for a facility specified in column 2 of the table below by a person who falls within a description specified in column 3 of the table opposite the facility for each night commencing on the day specified in the heading of column 4 of the table is the amount specified in that column 4 opposite the description.

The amount payable as the camp fee for a facility specified in column 2 of the table below by a person who falls within a description specified in column 3 of the table opposite the facility for each night commencing on the day specified in the heading of column 5 of the table is the amount specified in that column 5 opposite the description.

The amount payable as the camp fee for a facility specified in column 2 of the table below by a person who falls within a description specified in column 3 of the table opposite the facility for each night commencing on the day specified in the heading of column 6 of the table is the amount specified in that column 6 opposite the description.

The amount payable as the camp fee for a facility specified in column 2 of the table below by a person who falls within a description specified in column 3 of the table opposite the facility for each night commencing on the day specified in the heading of column 7 of the table is the amount specified in that column 7 opposite the description.
